vsParam:
Oh, [px]. Hi,
what are you doing here? Taking a walk?
Sensei, are you taking a walk too?
I am taking my own break.

Ho ho, yes.
It's a great day for a walk.

I see... Ho ho, I'll keep this a secret.
I won't tell Bergamot Sensei.

Prolonged studying or working makes people depressed. It's
important to take adequate rest and get some fresh air, right?

And some new ideas would just come
while taking a walk.

Exactly, like new ideas on teaching.
The idea of making cookies in class came to me while walking.

Right now I'm thinking about the next lesson.
I want everyone to find joy in learning.

Marjoram Sensei.
The curriculum plan earlier was also...

Why would you do so much for the students?
Just because you are a sensei?

Uh, well. This is one of the reasons,
and you guys are so kawaii. But most importantly...

I don't want my students to go through
the hardship I'd been through when I was younger.

My wizardry was actually self-taught.
I couldn't afford to study at the Academy.

I didn't have a sensei to guide me. And I had to work hard to
cover my expenses in learning wizardry...

When I finally saved enough money to purchase a wizardry
book, I had to light a candle and study until midnight.
I didn't know Marjoram Sensei had such a bitter past...

So after I got recruited to the Palace,
I still wanted to help those who aspire to be witches or wizards.

Luckily, the Academy has a comprehensive training
system for witches and wizards. So...
That's why you came to the Academy and became a lecturer?

Yes. Compared with being a witch in the Palace, I prefer
helping children who aspire to become witches and wizards.

So, I'm very happy to see my students grow up
and make steady progress!

And I couldn't help but teach them more knowledge,
and help them to become outstanding witches and wizards...

Oh gee. I totally lost track of time.
I must go now...

See you next time. [px], if you run into any problem,
just come and ask me anytime.

I understand... Marjoram Sensei had such a bitter past,
that's why she does everything for her students' own good.
I am so envious of Sorel.

Yes. I can understand your feeling,
[px].

Exactly. It's so nice to have someone who always
cares for you.

If I were a student of a sensei like her,
I'd be way smarter than now!

Ah... But, I also feel that her love
is kind of too heavy, ha ha ha...
